医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
小剂量氯胺酮可缓解芬太尼戒断症状药物过量是美国年轻人受伤死亡的主要原因，芬太尼每年导致超过 70,000 人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Low-dose-ketamine-eases-fentanyl-withdrawal-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Low-dose-ketamine-eases-fentanyl-withdrawal-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=504286f1-7​​04b-4d14-925f-c609ad86a59f Tue, 17 Sep 2024 22:38:18 -0400 Low-dose ketamine eases fentanyl withdrawal symptoms
远程医疗应用程序被发现可以提高阿片类药物使用障碍治疗的保留率俄勒冈健康与科学大学领导的一项新研究发现，通过远程医疗移动应用程序开始治疗阿片类药物使用障碍的患者在六个月内坚持治疗的比例高于在实体诊所开始治疗的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Telehealth-app-found-to-improve-retention-rates-in-opioid-use-disorder-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Telehealth-app-found-to-improve-retention-rates-in-opioid-use-disorder-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=775f78f7-f1aa-49d9-a591-29490498392b Tue, 17 Sep 2024 22:34:17 -0400 Telehealth app found to improve retention rates in opioid use disorder treatment
加州大学圣地亚哥分校研究人员获得 2100 万美元资助，用于研究动物的感觉协调对于所有动物来说，感觉处理事关生存。视觉、嗅觉、触觉、味觉和听觉——；这些感官的协调有助于它们寻找食物、返回庇护所并逃离危险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/UC-San-Diego-researcher-receives-2421-million-grant-to-study-sensory-coordination-in-animals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/UC-San-Diego-researcher-receives-2421-million-grant-to-study-sensory-coordination-in-animals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51364d4c-1ba0-4241-9983-25b313a666e9 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 21:05:00 -0400 UC San Diego researcher receives $21 million grant to study sensory coordination in animals
冠状动脉疾病死亡的社会经济差异与不健康行为有关与较高的社会经济地位相比，较低的社会经济地位与较高的冠状动脉疾病死亡率相关，超过一半的差异可以用四种不健康行为来解释。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Socioeconomic-disparities-in-coronary-artery-disease-deaths-linked-to-unhealthy-behaviors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Socioeconomic-disparities-in-coronary-artery-disease-deaths-linked-to-unhealthy-behaviors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b89da051-3021-4c37-a5b9-8fb80da9bbbf Tue, 17 Sep 2024 21:01:19 -0400 Socioeconomic disparities in coronary artery disease deaths linked to unhealthy behaviors
加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究将童年创伤与以后生活中特定性别的健康风险联系起来加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心 (UCLA Health) 领导的一项新研究发现，一个人的性别及其独特的童年创伤经历可能对其生物健康和日后罹患 20 种主要疾病的风险产生特定的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/UCLA-study-links-childhood-trauma-to-sex-specific-health-risks-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/UCLA-study-links-childhood-trauma-to-sex-specific-health-risks-later-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22a46696-1b60-4262-9538-971396951900 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 20:55:19 -0400 UCLA study links childhood trauma to sex-specific health risks later in life
探索 1 型糖尿病对儿童大脑发育影响的大规模研究大约一半的 1 型糖尿病成人面临严重的认知障碍，包括影响日常思维的工作记忆和执行功能问题。但人们对这种疾病在对大脑健康发育至关重要的一段时间内如何影响儿童知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Large-scale-study-to-explore-impact-of-type-1-diabetes-on-brain-development-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Large-scale-study-to-explore-impact-of-type-1-diabetes-on-brain-development-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7b47ca4-d5e4-460f-9964-f6dbba8969df Tue, 17 Sep 2024 20:47:54 -0400 Large-scale study to explore impact of type 1 diabetes on brain development in children
狼疮研究联盟宣布 2024 年狼疮研究多样性奖获得者狼疮研究联盟 (LRA) 很高兴地宣布 2024 年职业发展和博士后奖的获得者，以促进狼疮研究的多样性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Lupus-Research-Alliance-announces-2024-Diversity-in-Lupus-Research-Award-recipients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Lupus-Research-Alliance-announces-2024-Diversity-in-Lupus-Research-Award-recipients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=350c030b-c716-4b10-8d01-6df8b11d23cf Tue, 17 Sep 2024 20:40:38 -0400 Lupus Research Alliance announces 2024 Diversity in Lupus Research Award recipients
ECU 研究强调对潜在抗生素过敏的儿童进行适当评估埃迪斯科文大学 (ECU) 的研究强调，疑似抗生素过敏的儿童需要接受药物过敏服务的全面评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/ECU-research-emphasizes-proper-evaluation-for-children-with-potial-antibiotic-allergies-Research-From-Edith.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/ECU-research-emphasizes-proper-evaluation-for-children-with-potial-antibiotic-allergies-Research-From-Edith.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f71c7205-624d-47ec-889d-70c9616aca1a Tue, 17 Sep 2024 20:36:00 -0400 ECU research emphasizes proper evaluation for children with potential antibiotic allergies
研究揭示顺序神经元激活调节食物摄入食物摄入的过程似乎是在细胞水平上组织起来的，就像一场接力赛：在进食过程中，接力棒在不同的神经元组之间传递，直到我们消耗了适量的能量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Study-reveals-sequential-neuronal-activation-regulate-food-intake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Study-reveals-sequential-neuronal-activation-regulate-food-intake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3f05c27-8da5-48dc-adc3-ba3263521686 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 20:32:08 -0400 Study reveals sequential neuronal activation regulating food intake
评估减肥和血糖控制对 2 型糖尿病患者的影响克利夫兰诊所的一个研究小组发表了第一项研究，评估了体重减轻和血糖控制对接受抗糖尿病药物治疗的 2 型糖尿病患者的临床结果的独立现实影响，特别是 GLP-1RA（此类药物包括 Ozempic 和 Wegovy）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Assessing-the-impact-of-weight-loss-and-blood-sugar-control-in-people-with-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Assessing-the-impact-of-weight-loss-and-blood-sugar-control-in-people-with-type-2-diabetes.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5bc619ae-9f68-4edc-a604-1b0b1cb950d5 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 20:21:54 -0400 Assessing the impact of weight loss and blood sugar control in people with type 2 diabetes
